thread.title: NY authorities probe discovery of dog missing over a year
thread.title_full: NY authorities probe discovery of dog missing over a year - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: wcax.com
title: NY authorities probe discovery of dog missing over a year
text:
MINEOLA, N.Y. (AP) - Authorities on Long Island are investigating after a dog reported missing more than a year ago was found abandoned outside a Hempstead veterinary clinic.
The poodle-mix dog named Nino was suffering from open wounds and was covered in bloody bandages when it was found on a small bed outside the entryway to the clinic on Tuesday morning.
Nassau County prosecutors say they have acquired a video depicting someone leaving the animal there. It shows two people walking past the clinic, then one of the people returns and leaves the dog near a door.
Nino was identified because of a microchip implant. The dog's owner had reported it missing from her front yard.
The dog is expected to be reunited with its owner after it recovers.
